ValidationRule.description: Cannot change the status of a case to Resolved if the case is owned by a Queue, it should be owned by a user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL (Status,'Resolved'), BEGINS( OwnerId, '00G'), OR ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "DE_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "CD_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "PY_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Talabat_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "AT_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "FP_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "HU_Inbound_Case", RecordType.DeveloperName = "YE_Inbound_Case" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The case cannot be resolved if the owner is a queue, you should take ownership of the case.
